readme_content:
# [![Adityakrishnan header](https://github.com/adi-code22/adi-code22/blob/main/files/Adityakrishnan.png?raw=true)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/adi-code22/) ![](https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=adi-code22) [![GitHub Adityakrishnan](https://img.shields.io/github/followers/adi-code22?label=follow&style=social)](https://github.com/adi-code22)

     

## AdityA here, 👋 Software Engineer, **Bachelor of Technology(B. Tech.)** in **Computer Science and Engineering**, interested in latest IT technologies and the same curiosity led me in mastering domains like ***Mobile Application Development and Machine Learning***. A fast learner, team player who can work with challenging environment and diverse teams in combining manifold knowledge according to the requirements of my client. A Passionate programmer and thriving analyst with the ability to apply ML algorithms to solve real-world problems. - 💻 Software Developer Engineer at **Baton Systems** - 💻 Ex-Data Analyst Intern at **Ernst & Young (EY)**. - 🔭 Volunteering as **CEO** of [IEDC CCE](https://iedc.cce.edu.in/) | [GDSC Lead](https://gdsc-cce.netlify.app/#/) | Christ College of Engineering. - 📫 How to reach me: adityakrishnanp007@gmail.com - 🌱 Now learning Advanced Computer Architecture and Spring Boot. - 👯 I’m looking forward to collaborate on Flutter and NLP Projects. - 💬 Ask me about Flutter, Python, ML, C/C++, Competitive Programming. - ⚡ Fun fact: I ❤️ to code.

 

 

## Technically. . . - 💻 Languages: C/C++, Java, Python, Dart, GoLang. - 💻 Frameworks: Flutter, SpringBoot, NLP, Tensorflow/Keras, Spacy, Arduino. - 💻 Database: Firebase, MySQL, MongoDB, Hibernate, JPA. - 💻 VCS: Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket. - 💻 Hosting: Heroku, Firebase Hosting, AWS, Replit. - 💻 Hardware: nodeMCU, arduino NANO, arduino UNO. - 💻 OS: Windows, Linux.

profile_summary:
Here is a concise and SEO-optimized first-person profile description highlighting the developer's strongest technical skills and expertise.

"I'm a skilled software engineer with expertise in C++, C, and Python, as well as a proficient knowledge of Java and Go-Lang. With a background in Computer Science and Engineering, my passion lies in building mobile applications with Flutter and applying machine learning concepts to tackle real-world problems. As a fast learner and team player, I thrive in diverse environments where I can leverage my skills to deliver innovative solutions. My experience spans software development, data analysis, and leadership, with a current focus on mobile app development and natural language processing."

This summary incorporates the following details from the profile:

- Technical skills (C, C++, Python, Java, Go-Lang, Flutter, Machine Learning)
- Background and education (Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering)
- Professional experience (Software Developer Engineer at Baton Systems, Ex-Data Analyst Intern at Ernst & Young (EY))
- Technical capabilities in machine learning, mobile app development, and natural language processing.
- Desire to collaborate on Flutter and NLP projects and continue learning.
